Package cz.ive.simulation

Classes providing control among application run like Calendar, Scheduler and Interpreter.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Calendar Simulation calendar.
CalendarPlanning Simulation calendar access point.
Interpreter Interpreter interface.
Scheduler Takes care of real/simulation time conversion, shifting the calendar and passing control to gui.
SchedulingStatistics Interface for controlling scheduling statistics.
Updateable Implementations of this interface are able to pospond some actions.
 

Class Summary
CalendarImpl Simulation calendar.
CalendarPlanner Simulation calendar access point.
SchedulerImpl Takes care of real/simulation time conversion, shifting the calendar and passing control to gui.
SchedulingState Class used to store scheduling info when saving the simulation.
SchedulingStatisticsImpl Class providing scheduling statistics
Updator This class remembers set of instances of classes that implements Updateable interface and if method update is invoked, it calls update methods of all remembered classes.
WorldInterpreter The interpreter of the world.
 

Enum Summary
CalendarPlanner.RoundHookPosition Positions of roundHook
SimulationState Possible states of the simulation
WorldInterpreter.RunningProcessMode The LOD mode of the running process.
 

Package cz.ive.simulation Description

Classes providing control among application run like Calendar, Scheduler and Interpreter. Calendar stores all planning operations and scheduler is choosing them to be started. Interpreter is main manager of the simulation.
